name: CandyMeow
description:
This game is pretty easy! Only two button control!

A, left arrow / D, right arrow - move left/right

Double click for faster movement speed!

Eat all the sweets and try to avoid all the nasty bananas and cucumbers.

Additional info:

Time to code and make art: 10 hours

Time to make music: 5 hours :(

Total time working: 15 hours with 5 people.
